text: A Wall of Silence () is a 1993 Argentine Mexican British drama movie directed by Lita Stantic and starring Vanessa Redgrave, Lorenzo Quinteros, Ofelia Medina, Lautaro Murúa, Soledad Villamil, Julio Chávez. ==Other websites== * Category:1993 drama movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:British drama movies
title: A Wall of Silence
